header.#text: Certain small business taxpayers permitted To use cash accounting method without limitation

text.#text: With respect to an eligible taxpayer who uses the cash receipts and disbursements method for any taxable year, such method shall be deemed to clearly reflect income and the taxpayer shall not be required to use an accrual method.
For purposes of this subsection, a taxpayer is an eligible taxpayer with respect to any taxable year if—

header.#text: Small business taxpayers not required To use inventories

text.#text: A qualified taxpayer shall not be required to use inventories under this section for a taxable year.

If a qualified taxpayer does not use inventories with respect to any property for any taxable year beginning after December 31, 2013, such property shall be treated as a material or supply which is not incidental.
